Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 15 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Claw, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 11 Slashing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Hezrou makes 3 attacks, one with its Bite and two with its Claws

Abilities.Ability 1: Magic Resistance, The Hezrou has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects
Abilities.Ability 2: Stench, The Hezrou emits a noxious stench that causes creatures that breathe it in to be poisoned

Damage Resistances.Damage 4: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical effects
